channel.title: How can i make myself ADMIN?
channel.description: I started a private server and it already has giant monsters all over varrock but how can i make myself admin?? it says that there are already 3 admins (Dragon Mage, Vodka and Wolf)

item.title: How can i make myself ADMIN?

item.description:

where is the client.java??

OMFG I CAUGHT ONE THIS IS DEFFINETLY GOING IN MY SIG

item.title: How can i make myself ADMIN?
item.dc:creator: @Oo_Java Oo Java
item.description:
@Oo_Java wrote:

Yeah, because they were the admins on the source you’re using. P16 I take.

Go to your client.java and search /admin

change the names in the (“NAMEHERE”) to your new admins.

Read full topic
item.source: How can i make myself ADMIN?

item.title: How can i make myself ADMIN?
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

Go to the folder Characters and lick your account e.g owner
Edit the line that says character-rights and change the 0 into 2
Hurray, you are admin now

Read full topic
